channel.title: SFoL 21 - Hail Hydra - The Blue Dragon and Scorned Win!
channel.description:
## :knight::knight: [color=steblue] Welcome to SFOL21![/color] :physician::physician: <small>Hosted by Marluxion and NozBugz! </small> # [color=steblue]What's a hydra game?[/color] A hydra game is one in which every play slot is instead filled by TWO people working as a team. Otherwise, this will function as a standard FOL.
## [color=steblue]Rules[/color] :scroll: All standard FoL rules apply. Majority is in effect 72 Hour Days / 24 Hour Nights
If you do NOT have a partner in mind when joining, you can **/SignUp RNG**, everyone who signed up with RNG will have a partner randomly assigned to them at gamestart.
Aiming for the normal 16 players, AKA 32 People! We'll start with 12 (24 people) if we can't get 16.
## [color=steblue]Playerlist[/color] :notebook: 1. Firekitten/NuclearBurrito (NuclearKitten) - **Lynched D2 - [color=red]Seeker[/color]** 2. Celeste_Ludenberg/Pug (Pugeste) 3. Moleland/Orangeandblack5 (OrangeAndMole5) - **Lynched D4 - [color=red]Ritualist[/color]** 4. Livicus/Lymphoma (Liviphoma) - **Lynched D5 - [color=steblue]Physician[/color]** 5. Ashe/MTheJoker (AsheTheJoker) - **Lynched D3 - [color=grey]Reaper[/color]** 6. Whammerist/PokemonKidRyan (WhamKidRyan) 7. Sam17z/Frostwolf103 (Frostsam) - **Killed N2 - [color=red]Apostle[/color]** 8. Icibalus/Unknown (Iciown) :crown: 9. Eevee/Insanity (InsanEevee) 10. Damafaud/Shurian (Shurifaud) 11. Simon/Igneel (Ingmon) 12. Hippolytus/HTM (Hippo™) - **Lynched D4 - [color=red]Devout King[/color]** 13. Parfait/AsrielDreemur (ParfaitDreemurr) - **Died N1 - [color=grey]Alchemist[/color]** 14. Boss110/Techwolves (Bosswolves) - **Died N5 - [color=steblue]Maid[/color]** 15. CheesyKnives/Dusanking (CheesyMeme) - **Killed N4 - [color=red]Cult Leader[/color]** 16. Rogue/MaximusPrime (RoguePrime) 17. Psychoneirik/Poisonsquid (PsychoSquid) - **Died N1 - [color=steblue]Knight[/color]**
Backups - @Nerbins
## Useful Links :link: [Forum of Lies Hub ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515/93) [Class Card Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998)
## Shortcuts :fortune_cookie: [Start of Game / D1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-21-hail-hydra-day-1/60493/293?u=marluxion) [End of D1 / Start of D2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-21-hail-hydra-day-1-17-17-alive/60493/1383?u=marluxion) [NuclearKitten's Lynch and the Start of D3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-21-hail-hydra-day-2-15-17-alive-ode-to-an-alchemist/60493/2781?u=marluxion) [Ashe's Reaping and the Start of D4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-21-hail-hydra-night-3-13-17-alive-dont-fear-the-reaper/60493/3075?u=marluxion) [The Creation of the Perfect Popcorn and the Start of D5](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-21-hail-hydra-night-4-11-17-alive-hip-with-the-cult/60493/3911?u=marluxion) [The Seperating of Liviphoma's Heads and the Start of D6](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-21-hail-hydra-day-5-10-17-alive-meme-cult/60493/4552?u=marluxion) [orangemole's Execution and the start of D7](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-21-hail-hydra-day-6-8-17-alive-nacl/60493/5340?u=marluxion)

item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Marluxion:

Also the Salt Argument between Ritualist + Previous contract might have been one of the silliest things ive ever seen.

People are so quick to assume toxicity and gamethrowing that they skip Occam’s Razor. Aka The Merc bussing his contract is scum.

that was literally the argument I made… the entire time…
do you read your own games? lol

Read full topic
